body: Clyde Drexler scored 25 points as the surging Portland Trail Blazers beat Charlotte, 105-96, last night in Charlotte, N.C., handing the third-year Hornets a franchise-worst 11th consecutive loss. title: A Mobile Hospital May End Its Rounds Because of Gunshots
